metadataAttributes.id: TPM-04.2 - External Connectivity Requirements - Identification of Ports, Protocols & Services
metadataAttributes.title: TPM-04.2 - External Connectivity Requirements - Identification of Ports, Protocols & Services
metadataAttributes.summary: Mechanisms exist to require External Service Providers (ESPs) to identify and document the business need for ports, protocols and other services it requires to operate its processes and technologies.
